keyword: calories in ice cream cone mcdonalds
title: Calories in McDonald's Ice Cream Cone
meta_description: Discover calories in ice cream cone mcdonalds, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in McDonald's Ice Cream Cone
assumptions: Standard vanilla soft serve ice cream cone from McDonald's, approximately 105g serving, no toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, serving size, and customizations; check McDonald's app or website for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One McDonald's vanilla ice cream cone contains about 200 calories and 25g of sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Choose chocolate soft serve instead of vanilla

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's ice cream cone?
faqs.a: About 200 calories for one standard vanilla cone.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in ice cream cone mcdonalds?
faqs.a: Approximately 33g of carbs, mostly from sugars at 25g.

faqs.q: Is the McDonald's cone high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, with 25g of sugars per cone, which is over half the daily recommended limit for many diets.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a McDonald's ice cream cone?
faqs.a: Around 5g total fat, including 3g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's ice cream cone have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0g trans fat in the standard vanilla cone.
